title: Acceleration of object from velocity time graph

content.question: The acceleration of the object at time t = 0.7 s is most nearly equal to which of the following?

choices.label: The value of the graph where it crosses the 0.7 s grid line
The slope of the line connecting the origin and the point where the graph crosses the 0.7 s grid line
The area under the curve between where the graph crosses the time axis near 0.63 s and time 0.7 s
The slope of the tangent to a best-fit sinusoidal curve at 0.7 s

content.answer: The slope of the tangent to a best-fit sinusoidal curve at 0.7 s

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
